verses.name: 1 Corinthians 12:1
verses.text: Now concerning spiritual gifts, brethren, I would not have you ignorant.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 12:2
verses.text: Ye know that ye were Gentiles, carried away unto these dumb idols, even as ye were led.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 12:3
verses.text: Wherefore I give you to understand, that no man speaking by the Spirit of God calleth Jesus accursed: and that no man can say that Jesus is the Lord, but by the Holy Ghost.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 12:4
verses.text: Now there are diversities of gifts, but the same Spirit.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 12:5
verses.text: And there are differences of administrations, but the same Lord.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 12:6
verses.text: And there are diversities of operations, but it is the same God which worketh all in all.
